Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Personalize \Per"son*al*ize\, v. t. [imp. & p. p. {Personalized}; p. pr. & vb. n. {Personalizing}.] To make personal. ``They personalize death.'' --H. Spencer. [1913 Webster]
personalize v : make personal or more personal; "personalized service" [syn: {personalise}, {individualize}, {individualise}] [ant: {depersonalize}, {depersonalize}]
